pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, January 21, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Winnipeg, Manitoba

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

East Ballroom
Fairmont Winnipeg Hotel
2 Lombard Place

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:30 a.m. in the main lobby.

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Closed to media.
